subject: Play Fantasy Football With The Webs Top League Manager
body:
Fantasy Football Commissioner 2007













PLAY THE #1 FANTASY SPORT WITH THE WEB'S TOP LEAGUE MANAGER.GET THE BEST DEAL OF THE YEAR
Fantasy Football Commissioner has all the features your league craves for less than $11 per person.*
FANTASY FOOTBALL COMMISSIONER VS FREE FANTASY FOOTBALL






FEATURE

COMMISSIONER

FREE



Custom Scoring System







Custom League Rules - Add/Drop, Trades, Roster Limits, Etc.







Custom Divisional Settings







Custom Playoff Scenarios







Archived League Information By Year







Individual Defensive Players







Dynasty (Keeper) League Capability







Custom Draft Date And Order







Commwire







FREE Wireless Access







League Message Boards







LIVE Scoring and Stats






Fantasy Football Commissioner is currently available for $129.95*. That's $20 below regular price + get a FREE draft board AND save 15% OFF NFL gear in the CBS Sports Store!




Fantasy Home | Fantasy Football | Fantasy Baseball | Fantasy Basketball | Fantasy Hockey








*Less than $11 per person in a 12 team league. That's 4 months of Fantasy Football luxury for less than a case of beer!
Officially licensed product of PLAYERS INC. The PLAYERS INC logo is a registered trademark of the NFL players. nflplayers.com © 2007 PLAYERS INC.



 Offer open only to legal residents of the United States and District of Columbia, 13 years of age or older and a registered user of one or more of the CBS network sites. Offer expires on Wednesday June 27, 2007 at 11:59 P.M ET. Free draft board and NFL Gear cannot be shipped to Alaska, Hawaii, APO/FPO addresses or P.O. Boxes. Offer valid only while supplies last. Limit one $20 discount and draft board per League purchase. 15% discount valid only for purchases of 2007 NFL Gear at the CBS Store through August 31, 2007 and is limited to styles/sizes available. Discount not valid on previous purchases. Offer not redeemable for cash and cannot be combined with any other promotional offer. Customer responsible for
 all shipping costs for returned merchandise. This offer is not applicable to orders placed through Group Sales. This promotion may be modified or terminated at any time without notice. Certain terms and restrictions apply. Void where prohibited by law.
